posts.text:
Er með nokkur sata kort til sölu, virka öll ljómandi vel með linux md raid og zfs.
2 x Promise SATA 300 Tx4 (4 porta JBOD kort) 
http://firstweb.promise.com/marketing/d ... 040605.pdf
1 x Promise FastTrak TX2300 (2 porta RAID kort) 
http://ftps.zdnet.com.cn/files/2/16381.pdf
2 x Adaptec 2610SA (6 porta RAID kort) 
https://www.adaptec.com/en-us/support/r ... ar-2410sa/
Engar verðhugmyndir - tilboð óskast.
